# Decision

Record your decision on whether AI should be used
to draft incident postmortems.

State your position clearly.

# Accountability and Ownership

Use the questions below to guide your reasoning.
Do not copy them into your response.

- Who owns the accuracy of a postmortem?
- How does AI authorship affect accountability for failure?
- Can responsibility be clearly assigned if the narrative is automated?
- How might AI-written postmortems affect trust with stakeholders?

Write in your own words.
Do not describe implementation details or tools.
